My stay at Gale's house was so outstanding that I had the best vacation time ever. The house was comfortable, cool, and beautifully decorated. Its on a street that hardly had any traffic and that made it very quite and peaceful. It's surrounded big green trees and shrubs, with big front yard and back yard and patio. Its close to Edisto Gardens, practically within walking distance - great for hiking the board walk along the river. The photos of the home on Airnb are spot on. I was thrilled to have all that Sun light coming in.

I would get up early in the morning, sit by the front door and listen to the birds and crickets doing their thing. I don't know if Gale knows this, but every morning about the same time, a humming bird comes to visit the plants on the front porch. I'd run to get my camera, but before I could get back he or she would be gone. LOL.

Gale called often to check on me and I appreciated that and if i need directions, She knew right away how to get there. After a while we would get to talking like I had known her for years, She's so friendly and hospitable. This is a very comfortable spot for vacation, for rest, and to enjoy the peace and love that has been created with in this home. I almost didn't wanna leave, but I will be back.

Boyfriend jokes that every time we stay at an AirBnB, I say I would love to live there. This time, he said it too.
This is the perfect place to bring your kids for a family vacation - but also the perfect place for a couples weekend - and somehow also the perfect place for a girl’s getaway, too.
The house was clean, and the huge kitchen was extremely well-equipped. (I had minor pots-and-pans envy while making supper one night.) The Piggly Wiggly down the road had everything we needed. The bedrooms weren’t anything special but they were comfortable, as were the living/dining room, which opened up to an AWESOME screened in porch and then outside.

She asked me when I booked if it was just me. I said yes but I’m going to try to find someone to share the cost of the unit as we had an event while there and wouldn’t really be there except to sleep and shower. At that time she let me know that if I switched houses she wouldn’t charge me extra for added guest. Once we arrived and my friend got there first she told her that it would be extra because she only charged me for one person. Once I found out I had to contact her to remind her of our agreement. At that point she told me that I needed to leave a tip for the house keeper which was not what she originally said. Then I asked her how much she expected me to tip and I did leave that much of a tip. Second, a day into our stay she informed me that the internet wasn’t working and asked if she could bring the guy in to fix it. I informed her that it was working fine for us that morning (we were at our event from 9am-9pm each day so we weren’t there). She then informed me that the internet where she had cameras on our driveway weren’t working and couldn’t see our activity and it was bothering her. I then gave my permission for her to enter the house. We didn’t really want to because our personal belongings were in the house but complied. At one point when the lady who picked us up was there and we were loading into the car she came up to the car inquiring about how many people were in the car to see if she could charge us more. If these things hadn’t occurred I would have given 5 stars ⭐️ but just couldn’t as we felt spied on and like we had to give permission to enter the house without us being there.
